thread.section_title: Hotel Monge - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: What a gem
thread.title_full: What a gem - Review of Hotel Monge, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Saran F
title: What a gem
text:
Visited with 3 of my friends sharing 2 rooms. The hotel has been recently updated and didn't disappoint.
Firstly the hotel is very easy to access from the metro with just a 200 yard walk from Cardinal Lemione station.
Rooms are excellently appointed and beautifully decorated. We were on the 5th floor with view across he amphitheater at the back. Lovely big bathroom with walk in shower. Plenty of wardrobe space and big comfortable bed. L'occitane toiletries were a lovely addition. Everything was spotless.
The hotel staff are very helpful and courteous. Check in was a breeze and they booked a taxi for our return trip to the airport €75 for a large people carrier for the 4 of us.
Breakfast was a nice continental selection and plentiful. Lovely breads and pastries and a small hot selection.
There is a small but nice bar area with an honesty bar. A glass of wine was €5 so good value.
There were a few bistros nearby and a small supermarket and Boulangerie so well equipped.
A nice walk (or route march) to Notre Dame and you're in the midst of tourist spots. A great location and would definitely go back.
